content: I was able to successfully log into jira.hl7.org but when I click "Create" it prompts me to request a new account. I fill out the form but it will not submit because I already have an account.... how do I get around this? Am I doing something wrong?
Weird. I hate to say this, but have you tried logging out and logging in again. Also what URL are you at when you click on 'create'?
Logged out and back in, no luck. I. am at https://jira.hl7.org/secure/Dashboard.jspa

Hello Benjamin, I'm looking into this now. I think it's a caching issue. What browser are you using? For now, while logged in, please go to https://jira.hl7.org/secure/CreateIssue.jspa?pid=10405 to create a FHIR Spec related issue
@Joshua Procious I am in Safari. I will use the other link for now

@Benjamin Langley I am able to replicate this issue if i open multiple tabs while logged into Jira, close a tab, and then try on a new tab. I was able to rectify by completely logging out, closing all tabs of my current browser (Chrome) and then logging back in. After I logged back in, I went to Dashboards>FHIR-Issues and then "Create" at top was acting normal. I will continue to look into this.
Ok, please let me know if you are unable to create using that method.

So I don't think I'm doing something right. I am trying to add a ticket for the DaVinci PAS IG. I watched the video on how to create an issue (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xvz3eBqB0sk&list=PL4DUfomz2RZwqt51oQ6oQUMYhUAqHJsse&index=3) but I don't see Change. Request as an option. Only Task, Story, Bug, Epic
When you go here: https://jira.hl7.org/secure/CreateIssue.jspa?pid=10405 are you seeing "Project" as "FHIR Specification Feedback..." by default?
Okay wait now I am. But before I had this: Screen-Shot-2019-11-22-at-10.45.10-AM.png

Ok, I think this is falling under the issue as before. I will look into Safari specifics related to this. Also, I've seen some field misalignment and other due to shoddy internet connection. This may play into it.
Thank you for looking into it and for your help. I was able to submit my change requests!

Fantastic. You're welcome. I'll continue to look into this issue as I'm guessing others could be affected as well. Updates to fixes and maintenance can be found here in the future https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/184932-JIRA.2FConfluence/topic/Maintenance.20Update
